data.title: [DRAFT] About the Department of Cannabis Control
data.excerpt: Mission Through innovative policies and effective implementation, the Department (DCC) advances and facilitates a well-regulated, legal market that benefits all Californians. Vision California has a safe, sustainable and equitable cannabis market that serves as an example for the world. Our values: Integrity, Fairness, Innovation, Knowledge, Collaboration, Support What we do The Department licenses and regulates […]
